Interface ImporterService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImporterServiceImpl

    public interface ImporterService
    Project: Masterthesis of Sascha Feldmann Creation date: 28.05.2016 Author: Sascha Feldmann (sascha.feldmann@gmx.de)

    University: Hochschule f√ºr Technik und Wirtschaft, Berlin Fachbereich 4 Studiengang Internationale Medieninformatik (Master)

    Company: adesso AG

    Service interface for the import module which works as a facade.

    • Method Detail

      • buildNewCourseInstance

        Course buildNewCourseInstance(java.lang.String courseTitle,
                              java.lang.String courseViewUrl,
                              Language courseMainLanguage)
        Builds a new course instance and returns it.
        Parameters:
        courseTitle - the course's title
        courseViewUrl - the URL to view the course
        courseMainLanguage - the main / primary language of the course
        Returns:
        the new course instance

      • addOrReplaceLearningContentByRawtext

        void addOrReplaceLearningContentByRawtext(Course course,
                                          java.lang.String contentTitle,
                                          java.lang.String contentRawText)
        Adds or replaces - if a learning content with the given title already belongs to the course - learning content to the given course.
        Parameters:
        course - the course that the learning content should be added to
        contentTitle - the unique content title. If content with this title was already attached to the course, it will be replaced.
        contentRawText - the raw text

      • addOrReplaceLearningContentByFile

        void addOrReplaceLearningContentByFile(Course course,
                                       java.io.File file)
                                throws ParserException
        Adds or replaces - if a learning content with the given files name already belongs to the course - learning content to the given course.
        Parameters:
        course - the course that the learning content should be added to
        file - the file containing learning content. The rawtexts will be extracted and automatically be added as rawtext.
        Throws:
        ParserException - if the raw text could not be extracted from the file due to several causes

      • removeLearningContent

        void removeLearningContent(Course course,
                           LearningContent learningContent)
        Removes the given learningContent from the given course.
        Parameters:
        course - the course that the learning content will be removed from
        learningContent - the learning content that should get removed

      • addOrReplaceLearningContentWithType

        void addOrReplaceLearningContentWithType(Course course,
                                         java.lang.String contentTitle,
                                         java.lang.String contentRawText,
                                         LearningContent.Type type)
        Adds or replaces - if a learning content with the given title already belongs to the course - learning content to the given course.
        Parameters:
        course - the course that the learning content should be added to
        contentTitle - the unique content title. If content with this title was already attached to the course, it will be replaced.
        contentRawText - the raw text
        type - the LearningContent.Type
